name: df-utop
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cutop, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cust)), crab(s1, cpw(cdm(cuni(cv(s0)))), wral(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wss(cima(cv(s3), csn(cv(s2))), cv(s1)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ unifTop =(s0 ∈ ⋃ ran(UnifOn)↦ { s1 ∈ P(dom(⋃ s0))| ∀(s2 ∈ s1, ∃(s3 ∈ s0,(s3 " { s2 })⊆ s1))})
comment: Definition of a topology induced by a uniform structure. Definition 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.4. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Nov-2017.)
